<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"approval_required_reviewers_enable":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否启用审批必需的评审者功能(最小评审人数[取消勾选传 0])"},"approval_required_reviewers":{"type":"integer","description":"需要的审批者数量(最小评审人数[选择的数字：1~5])","format":"int32"},"only_allow_merge_if_all_discussions_are_resolved":{"type":"boolean","description":"评审问题全部解决才能合入"},"only_allow_merge_if_pipeline_succeeds":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否仅在流水线成功后才允许合并"},"disable_merge_by_self":{"type":"boolean","description":"禁止合入自己创建的合并请求"},"can_force_merge":{"type":"boolean","description":"允许管理员强制合入"},"add_notes_after_merged":{"type":"boolean","description":"允许合并请求合并后继续做代码检视和评论"},"mark_auto_merged_mr_as_closed":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否将自动合并的MR状态标记为关闭状态"},"can_reopen":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否可以重新打开一个已经关闭的合并请求 "},"delete_source_branch_when_merged":{"type":"boolean","description":"合并时是否删除源分支，默认删除原分支"},"disable_squash_merge":{"type":"boolean","description":"禁止 Squash 合并"},"auto_squash_merge":{"type":"boolean","description":"新建合并请求，默认开启 Squash 合并"},"merge_method":{"type":"string","description":"合并模式三选一(通过 merge commit 合并：merge；通过 merge commit 合并 （记录半线性历史）：rebase_merge；fast - forward 合并：ff"},"squash_merge_with_no_merge_commit":{"type":"boolean","description":"Squash 合并不产生 Merge 节点"},"merged_commit_author":{"type":"string","description":"使用 MR (合入/创建) 者生成 Merge Commit（使用 PR 合入者生成 Merge Commit：传 merged_by; 使用 PR 创建者生成 Merge Commit：传 created_by）"},"approval_required_approvers":{"maximum":1000,"minimum":0,"type":"integer","description":"需要审批的批准者数量","format":"int32"},"approval_approver_ids":{"type":"string","description":"项目审查人, user_id 以逗号分隔"},"approval_tester_ids":{"type":"string","description":"项目测试人， user_id以逗号分隔"},"approval_required_testers":{"type":"integer","description":"测试最小通过人数","format":"int32"},"is_check_cla":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否校验CLA"},"is_allow_lite_merge_request":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否启用轻量级 Pull Request"},"lite_merge_request_prefix_title":{"type":"string","description":"轻量级 pr 的标题前缀"},"close_issue_when_mr_merged":{"type":"boolean","description":"创建 Pull Request 时,默认选中 “合并后关闭已关联的 Issue” "}},"description":"更新合并请求设置信息","title":"UpdateMergeRequestSettingReq"},"example":""}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
